1. Repair into the group chat chat box does not read the number of cumulative, and does not disappear.
2. Repair GIF can not be saved, can not click to enlarge the play.
3. Repair forwarding messages to their single hook display.

1.New function: Bots Mall, which you can have a deeper understanding of the service that our bots can provide for you. 
2.New language adaption:Kampuchea Language.
3.New table bar button style.
4.Now you can switch three themes for color matching in the "Appearance" option (Day Classic/Day/Night).
5.Now you can customize the keyboard return key to "Send/Replace line" in the "Privacy and Security" option.
6.Fixed known bugs.

Thanks for your feedback and suggestions. Remember our email address: admin@potato.im

1. New features: People nearby, You can find people nearby who are using potato now, and say hello to them.
2. New features: All members are forbidden to speak, the super group administrators can forbid members to speak, during this time, only group administrators and managers can send messages.
3. New features: private conversations are forbidden, the super group managers can forbid any members to create private chats.
4. New experience: Contacts and chats interface, we have integrated multiple functions into one button, you can do some operations more quickly.
5. Fixed known bugs.
Thanks for your feedback and suggestions. Remember our email address: admin@potato.im

1. New Function: Digital Wallets.
2. Compatible with XS/XS Max.
3. User online prompt is enhanced, you can clearly see your friend online states.

1. Accurately Search for Friends to Make Adding Friends Easier
2. Important Groups and Channels Can Be Favorited to Contact Dividing Lists
3. Asterisk Your Special Focused Friends
4. Add A New Function of Alphabetical Index to Quickly Find Your Contacts
5. Any comments can be submitted to us through feedback 
6. About Account and Information Security - Add A New Function of SMS Identifying Code Dynamic Verification
7. Overall Visual Adjustment and A New Function of Interactive Animation
Thanks for your feedback and suggestions. Remember our email address: admin@potato.im.
